definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: place, or act of planting;—abs. ´[[מ]] Ez Eze 34:29; cstr. [[מַטַּע]] Is 61:3; sf. [[מַטָּעוֹ]] Is 60:21 (Kt; Qr [[מַטָּעַי]]); [[מַטָּעָהּ]] Ez Eze 17:7, also Eze 31:4, but rd. [[מַטָּעׂה]] LXX Hi Co Berthol Toy; pl. cstr. [[מַטָּעֵי]] Mic 1:6; —

planting-place, [[מַטָּעֵי]] [[כָָרֶם]] Mic 1:6 planting-place for a vineyard, so Ez Eze 31:4 (rd. [[מַטָּעׂה]], v. supr.); prob. also [[לְשֵׁם]] ´[[מ]] < rd. [[שָׁלֽם]] ´[[מ]] LXX Co Berthol Toy i.e. peaceful (fruitful) planting-place; cf. ´[[עֲרֻגוֹת מ]] Eze 17:7 = beds where it was planted.
act of planting ´[[נֵחֶר מ]] Is 60:21 shoot of his (my) planting (fig. of people).
